Utility Belt
Keywords: Batman Family
INDESTRUCTIBLE
EQUIP: ANY
UNEQUIP: DROP
EFFECT: When equipped, place the Utility Belt in the circle on the back of this card with the arrow indicator pointing to the image of your choice. // FREE: Roll a d6. Turn the Utility Belt clockwise a number of times equal to the result. If this character has a listed keyword, turn it any number up to the result (minimum 1). This character can use the listed effect (if any) until your next turn.

Smoke Grenades: Smoke Cloud, Smoke Cloud as FREE
Handcuffs: Incapacitate, Plasticity
Grapnel Gun: Force Blast, Leap/Climb
Batarangs: Ranged Combat Expert, Minimum range value of 4
Disguise Kit: Improved Movement: Characters, Shape Change
First Aid Kit: Regeneration, Support
10 Points
